text:
The #NCGA just approved & sent @NC_Governor yet another #COVID19 relief bill:

☑️Extends application time for $335 Extra Credit Grants
☑️$39M to expand #ruralbroadband
☑️$1.6B to help #schools reopen 
☑️$95M for #vaccine distribution
☑️$546M for rental assistance program

#NCPOL https://t.co/XsHFISHbv2
